57#if (QS_OBJ_PTR_SIZE == 2U)
58 using QSObj = std::uint16_t;
59#elif (QS_OBJ_PTR_SIZE == 4U)
60 using QSObj = std::uint32_t;
61#elif (QS_OBJ_PTR_SIZE == 8U)
62 using QSObj = std::uint64_t;
63#endif

65struct CmdVar {
66 std::uint32_t param1;
67 std::uint32_t param2;
68 std::uint32_t param3;
69 std::uint8_t idx;
70 std::uint8_t cmdId;
71};
72
73struct TickVar {
74 std::uint_fast8_t rate;
75};
76
77struct PeekVar {
78 std::uint16_t offs;
79 std::uint8_t size;
80 std::uint8_t num;
81 std::uint8_t idx;
82};
83
84struct PokeVar {
85 std::uint32_t data;
86 std::uint16_t offs;
87 std::uint8_t size;
88 std::uint8_t num;
89 std::uint8_t idx;
90 std::uint8_t fill;
91};
92
93struct FltVar {
94 std::uint8_t data[16];
95 std::uint8_t idx;
96 std::uint8_t recId; // global/local
97};
98
99struct ObjVar {
100 QSObj addr;
101 std::uint8_t idx;
102 std::uint8_t kind; // see qs.hpp, enum QSpyObjKind
103 std::uint8_t recId;
104};
105
106struct EvtVar {
107 QP::QEvt *e;
108 std::uint8_t *p;
109 QP::QSignal sig;
110 std::uint16_t len;
111 std::uint8_t prio;
112 std::uint8_t idx;
113};

115// extended-state variables for the current QS-RX state
116static struct ExtState {
117 union Variant {
118 CmdVar cmd;
119 TickVar tick;
120 PeekVar peek;
121 PokeVar poke;
122 FltVar flt;
123 ObjVar obj;
124 EvtVar evt;
125#ifdef Q_UTEST
126 QP::QS::TProbe tp;
127#endif // Q_UTEST
128 } var;
129 std::uint8_t state;
130 std::uint8_t esc;
131 std::uint8_t seq;
132 std::uint8_t chksum;
133} l_rx;
134
135enum RxStateEnum : std::uint8_t {
136 ERROR_STATE,
137 WAIT4_SEQ,
138 WAIT4_REC,
139 WAIT4_INFO_FRAME,
140 WAIT4_CMD_ID,
141 WAIT4_CMD_PARAM1,
142 WAIT4_CMD_PARAM2,
143 WAIT4_CMD_PARAM3,
144 WAIT4_CMD_FRAME,
145 WAIT4_RESET_FRAME,
146 WAIT4_TICK_RATE,
147 WAIT4_TICK_FRAME,
148 WAIT4_PEEK_OFFS,
149 WAIT4_PEEK_SIZE,
150 WAIT4_PEEK_NUM,
151 WAIT4_PEEK_FRAME,
152 WAIT4_POKE_OFFS,
153 WAIT4_POKE_SIZE,
154 WAIT4_POKE_NUM,
155 WAIT4_POKE_DATA,
156 WAIT4_POKE_FRAME,
157 WAIT4_FILL_DATA,
158 WAIT4_FILL_FRAME,
159 WAIT4_FILTER_LEN,
160 WAIT4_FILTER_DATA,
161 WAIT4_FILTER_FRAME,
162 WAIT4_OBJ_KIND,
163 WAIT4_OBJ_ADDR,
164 WAIT4_OBJ_FRAME,
165 WAIT4_QUERY_KIND,
166 WAIT4_QUERY_FRAME,
167 WAIT4_EVT_PRIO,
168 WAIT4_EVT_SIG,
169 WAIT4_EVT_LEN,
170 WAIT4_EVT_PAR,
171 WAIT4_EVT_FRAME
172
173#ifdef Q_UTEST
174 ,
175 WAIT4_TEST_SETUP_FRAME,
176 WAIT4_TEST_TEARDOWN_FRAME,
177 WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_DATA,
178 WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_ADDR,
179 WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_FRAME,
180 WAIT4_TEST_CONTINUE_FRAME
181#endif // Q_UTEST
182};

184// internal helper functions...
185static void rxParseData_(std::uint8_t const b) noexcept;
186static void rxHandleGoodFrame_(std::uint8_t const state);
187static void rxHandleBadFrame_(std::uint8_t const state) noexcept;
188static void rxReportAck_(enum QP::QSpyRxRecords const recId) noexcept;
189static void rxReportError_(std::uint8_t const code) noexcept;
190static void rxReportDone_(enum QP::QSpyRxRecords const recId) noexcept;
191static void queryCurrObj_(std::uint8_t obj_kind) noexcept;
192static void rxPoke_() noexcept;

194// Internal QS-RX function to take a tran. in the QS-RX FSM
195static inline void tran_(RxStateEnum const target) noexcept {
196 l_rx.state = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(target);
197}

217//$define${QS::QS-RX} vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
218namespace QP {
219namespace QS {
220
221//${QS::QS-RX::rxInitBuf} ....................................................
222void rxInitBuf(
223 std::uint8_t * const sto,
224 std::uint16_t const stoSize) noexcept
225{
226 rxPriv_.buf = &sto[0];
227 rxPriv_.end = static_cast<QSCtr>(stoSize);
228 rxPriv_.head = 0U;
229 rxPriv_.tail = 0U;
230
231 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::SM_OBJ] = nullptr;
232 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::AO_OBJ] = nullptr;
233 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::MP_OBJ] = nullptr;
234 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::EQ_OBJ] = nullptr;
235 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::TE_OBJ] = nullptr;
236 rxPriv_.currObj[QS::AP_OBJ] = nullptr;
237
238 tran_(WAIT4_SEQ);
239 l_rx.esc = 0U;
240 l_rx.seq = 0U;
241 l_rx.chksum = 0U;
242
243 beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(QS_OBJ_DICT));
244 QS_OBJ_PRE_(&rxPriv_);
245 QS_STR_PRE_("QS_RX");
246 endRec_();
247 // no QS_REC_DONE(), because QS is not running yet
248
249 #ifdef Q_UTEST
250 tstPriv_.tpNum = 0U;
251 tstPriv_.testTime = 0U;
252 #endif // Q_UTEST
253}
254
255//${QS::QS-RX::rxParse} ......................................................
256void rxParse() {
257 // NOTE: Must be called IN critical section.
258 // Also requires system-level memory access (QF_MEM_SYS()).
259
260 QSCtr tail = rxPriv_.tail;
261 while (rxPriv_.head != tail) { // QS-RX buffer NOT empty?
262 std::uint8_t b = rxPriv_.buf[tail];
263
264 ++tail;
265 if (tail == rxPriv_.end) {
266 tail = 0U;
267 }
268 rxPriv_.tail = tail; // update the tail to a *valid* index
269
270 if (l_rx.esc != 0U) { // escaped byte arrived?
271 l_rx.esc = 0U;
272 b ^= QS_ESC_XOR;
273
274 l_rx.chksum += b;
275 rxParseData_(b);
276 }
277 else if (b == QS_ESC) {
278 l_rx.esc = 1U;
279 }
280 else if (b == QS_FRAME) {
281 // get ready for the next frame
282 b = l_rx.state; // save the current state in b
283 l_rx.esc = 0U;
284 tran_(WAIT4_SEQ);
285
286 if (l_rx.chksum == QS_GOOD_CHKSUM) {
287 l_rx.chksum = 0U;
288 rxHandleGoodFrame_(b);
289 }
290 else { // bad checksum
291 l_rx.chksum = 0U;
292 rxReportError_(0x41U);
293 rxHandleBadFrame_(b);
294 }
295 }
296 else {
297 l_rx.chksum += b;
298 rxParseData_(b);
299 }
300 }
301}
302
303//${QS::QS-RX::rxGetNfree} ...................................................
304std::uint16_t rxGetNfree() noexcept {
305 // NOTE: Must be called IN critical section.
306 // Also requires system-level memory access (QF_MEM_SYS()).
307
308 QSCtr const head = rxPriv_.head;
309 std::uint16_t nFree;
310 if (head == rxPriv_.tail) { // buffer empty?
311 nFree = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(rxPriv_.end - 1U);
312 }
313 else if (head < rxPriv_.tail) {
314 nFree = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(rxPriv_.tail - head - 1U);
315 }
316 else {
317 nFree = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(rxPriv_.end + rxPriv_.tail
318 - head - 1U);
319 }
320 return nFree;
321}
322
323} // namespace QS
324} // namespace QP
325//$enddef${QS::QS-RX} ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
326
327//============================================================================
328//! @cond INTERNAL
329namespace { // unnamed local namespace
330
331//............................................................................
332static void rxParseData_(std::uint8_t const b) noexcept {
333 switch (l_rx.state) {
334 case WAIT4_SEQ: {
335 ++l_rx.seq;
336 if (l_rx.seq != b) { // not the expected sequence?
337 rxReportError_(0x42U);
338 l_rx.seq = b; // update the sequence
339 }
340 tran_(WAIT4_REC);
341 break;
342 }
343 case WAIT4_REC: {
344 switch (b) {
345 case QP::QS_RX_INFO:
346 tran_(WAIT4_INFO_FRAME);
347 break;
348 case QP::QS_RX_COMMAND:
349 tran_(WAIT4_CMD_ID);
350 break;
351 case QP::QS_RX_RESET:
352 tran_(WAIT4_RESET_FRAME);
353 break;
354 case QP::QS_RX_TICK:
355 tran_(WAIT4_TICK_RATE);
356 break;
357 case QP::QS_RX_PEEK:
358 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AP_OBJ] != nullptr) {
359 l_rx.var.peek.offs = 0U;
360 l_rx.var.peek.idx = 0U;
361 tran_(WAIT4_PEEK_OFFS);
362 }
363 else {
364 rxReportError_(
365 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_PEEK));
366 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
367 }
368 break;
369 case QP::QS_RX_POKE:
370 case QP::QS_RX_FILL:
371 l_rx.var.poke.fill =
372 (b == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_FILL))
373 ? 1U
374 : 0U;
375 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AP_OBJ] != nullptr) {
376 l_rx.var.poke.offs = 0U;
377 l_rx.var.poke.idx = 0U;
378 tran_(WAIT4_POKE_OFFS);
379 }
380 else {
381 rxReportError_(
382 (l_rx.var.poke.fill != 0U)
383 ? static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_FILL)
384 : static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_POKE));
385 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
386 }
387 break;
388 case QP::QS_RX_GLB_FILTER: // intentionally fall-through
389 case QP::QS_RX_LOC_FILTER:
390 l_rx.var.flt.recId = b;
391 tran_(WAIT4_FILTER_LEN);
392 break;
393 case QP::QS_RX_AO_FILTER: // intentionally fall-through
394 case QP::QS_RX_CURR_OBJ:
395 l_rx.var.obj.recId = b;
396 tran_(WAIT4_OBJ_KIND);
397 break;
398 case QP::QS_RX_QUERY_CURR:
399 l_rx.var.obj.recId =
400 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_QUERY_CURR);
401 tran_(WAIT4_QUERY_KIND);
402 break;
403 case QP::QS_RX_EVENT:
404 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_PRIO);
405 break;
406
407#ifdef Q_UTEST
408 case QP::QS_RX_TEST_SETUP:
409 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_SETUP_FRAME);
410 break;
411 case QP::QS_RX_TEST_TEARDOWN:
412 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_TEARDOWN_FRAME);
413 break;
414 case QP::QS_RX_TEST_CONTINUE:
415 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_CONTINUE_FRAME);
416 break;
417 case QP::QS_RX_TEST_PROBE:
418 if (QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpNum
419 < static_cast<std::uint8_t>(
420 (sizeof(QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpBuf)
421 / sizeof(QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpBuf[0]))))
422 {
423 l_rx.var.tp.data = 0U;
424 l_rx.var.tp.idx = 0U;
425 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_DATA);
426 }
427 else { // the # Test-Probes exceeded
428 rxReportError_(
429 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_TEST_PROBE));
430 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
431 }
432 break;
433#endif // Q_UTEST
434
435 default:
436 rxReportError_(0x43U);
437 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
438 break;
439 }
440 break;
441 }
442 case WAIT4_INFO_FRAME: {
443 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
444 break;
445 }
446 case WAIT4_CMD_ID: {
447 l_rx.var.cmd.cmdId = b;
448 l_rx.var.cmd.idx = 0U;
449 l_rx.var.cmd.param1 = 0U;
450 l_rx.var.cmd.param2 = 0U;
451 l_rx.var.cmd.param3 = 0U;
452 tran_(WAIT4_CMD_PARAM1);
453 break;
454 }
455 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM1: {
456 l_rx.var.cmd.param1 |=
457 (static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.cmd.idx);
458 l_rx.var.cmd.idx += 8U;
459 if (l_rx.var.cmd.idx == (8U*4U)) {
460 l_rx.var.cmd.idx = 0U;
461 tran_(WAIT4_CMD_PARAM2);
462 }
463 break;
464 }
465 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM2: {
466 l_rx.var.cmd.param2 |=
467 static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.cmd.idx;
468 l_rx.var.cmd.idx += 8U;
469 if (l_rx.var.cmd.idx == (8U*4U)) {
470 l_rx.var.cmd.idx = 0U;
471 tran_(WAIT4_CMD_PARAM3);
472 }
473 break;
474 }
475 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM3: {
476 l_rx.var.cmd.param3 |=
477 static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.cmd.idx;
478 l_rx.var.cmd.idx += 8U;
479 if (l_rx.var.cmd.idx == (8U*4U)) {
480 l_rx.var.cmd.idx = 0U;
481 tran_(WAIT4_CMD_FRAME);
482 }
483 break;
484 }
485 case WAIT4_CMD_FRAME: {
486 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
487 break;
488 }
489 case WAIT4_RESET_FRAME: {
490 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
491 break;
492 }
493 case WAIT4_TICK_RATE: {
494 l_rx.var.tick.rate = static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(b);
495 tran_(WAIT4_TICK_FRAME);
496 break;
497 }
498 case WAIT4_TICK_FRAME: {
499 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
500 break;
501 }
502 case WAIT4_PEEK_OFFS: {
503 if (l_rx.var.peek.idx == 0U) {
504 l_rx.var.peek.offs = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b);
505 l_rx.var.peek.idx += 8U;
506 }
507 else {
508 l_rx.var.peek.offs |= static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
509 static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b) << 8U);
510 tran_(WAIT4_PEEK_SIZE);
511 }
512 break;
513 }
514 case WAIT4_PEEK_SIZE: {
515 if ((b == 1U) || (b == 2U) || (b == 4U)) {
516 l_rx.var.peek.size = b;
517 tran_(WAIT4_PEEK_NUM);
518 }
519 else {
520 rxReportError_(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_PEEK));
521 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
522 }
523 break;
524 }
525 case WAIT4_PEEK_NUM: {
526 l_rx.var.peek.num = b;
527 tran_(WAIT4_PEEK_FRAME);
528 break;
529 }
530 case WAIT4_PEEK_FRAME: {
531 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
532 break;
533 }
534 case WAIT4_POKE_OFFS: {
535 if (l_rx.var.poke.idx == 0U) {
536 l_rx.var.poke.offs = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b);
537 l_rx.var.poke.idx = 1U;
538 }
539 else {
540 l_rx.var.poke.offs |= static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
541 static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b) << 8U);
542 tran_(WAIT4_POKE_SIZE);
543 }
544 break;
545 }
546 case WAIT4_POKE_SIZE: {
547 if ((b == 1U) || (b == 2U) || (b == 4U)) {
548 l_rx.var.poke.size = b;
549 tran_(WAIT4_POKE_NUM);
550 }
551 else {
552 rxReportError_((l_rx.var.poke.fill != 0U)
553 ? static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_FILL)
554 : static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_POKE));
555 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
556 }
557 break;
558 }
559 case WAIT4_POKE_NUM: {
560 if (b > 0U) {
561 l_rx.var.poke.num = b;
562 l_rx.var.poke.data = 0U;
563 l_rx.var.poke.idx = 0U;
564 tran_((l_rx.var.poke.fill != 0U)
565 ? WAIT4_FILL_DATA
566 : WAIT4_POKE_DATA);
567 }
568 else {
569 rxReportError_((l_rx.var.poke.fill != 0U)
570 ? static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_FILL)
571 : static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_POKE));
572 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
573 }
574 break;
575 }
576 case WAIT4_FILL_DATA: {
577 l_rx.var.poke.data |=
578 static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.poke.idx;
579 l_rx.var.poke.idx += 8U;
580 if ((l_rx.var.poke.idx >> 3U) == l_rx.var.poke.size) {
581 tran_(WAIT4_FILL_FRAME);
582 }
583 break;
584 }
585 case WAIT4_POKE_DATA: {
586 l_rx.var.poke.data |=
587 static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.poke.idx;
588 l_rx.var.poke.idx += 8U;
589 if ((l_rx.var.poke.idx >> 3U) == l_rx.var.poke.size) {
590 rxPoke_();
591 --l_rx.var.poke.num;
592 if (l_rx.var.poke.num == 0U) {
593 tran_(WAIT4_POKE_FRAME);
594 }
595 }
596 break;
597 }
598 case WAIT4_FILL_FRAME: {
599 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
600 break;
601 }
602 case WAIT4_POKE_FRAME: {
603 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
604 break;
605 }
606 case WAIT4_FILTER_LEN: {
607 if (b == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(sizeof(l_rx.var.flt.data))) {
608 l_rx.var.flt.idx = 0U;
609 tran_(WAIT4_FILTER_DATA);
610 }
611 else {
612 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.flt.recId);
613 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
614 }
615 break;
616 }
617 case WAIT4_FILTER_DATA: {
618 l_rx.var.flt.data[l_rx.var.flt.idx] = b;
619 ++l_rx.var.flt.idx;
620 if (l_rx.var.flt.idx == sizeof(l_rx.var.flt.data)) {
621 tran_(WAIT4_FILTER_FRAME);
622 }
623 break;
624 }
625 case WAIT4_FILTER_FRAME: {
626 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
627 break;
628 }
629 case WAIT4_OBJ_KIND: {
630 if (b <= static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS::SM_AO_OBJ)) {
631 l_rx.var.obj.kind = b;
632 l_rx.var.obj.addr = 0U;
633 l_rx.var.obj.idx = 0U;
634 tran_(WAIT4_OBJ_ADDR);
635 }
636 else {
637 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.obj.recId);
638 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
639 }
640 break;
641 }
642 case WAIT4_OBJ_ADDR: {
643 l_rx.var.obj.addr |=
644 static_cast<QSObj>(b) << l_rx.var.obj.idx;
645 l_rx.var.obj.idx += 8U;
646 if (l_rx.var.obj.idx
647 == (8U * static_cast<unsigned>(QS_OBJ_PTR_SIZE)))
648 {
649 tran_(WAIT4_OBJ_FRAME);
650 }
651 break;
652 }
653 case WAIT4_OBJ_FRAME: {
654 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
655 break;
656 }
657 case WAIT4_QUERY_KIND: {
658 if (b < static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS::MAX_OBJ)) {
659 l_rx.var.obj.kind = b;
660 tran_(WAIT4_QUERY_FRAME);
661 }
662 else {
663 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.obj.recId);
664 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
665 }
666 break;
667 }
668 case WAIT4_QUERY_FRAME: {
669 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
670 break;
671 }
672 case WAIT4_EVT_PRIO: {
673 l_rx.var.evt.prio = b;
674 l_rx.var.evt.sig = 0U;
675 l_rx.var.evt.idx = 0U;
676 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_SIG);
677 break;
678 }
679 case WAIT4_EVT_SIG: {
680 l_rx.var.evt.sig |= static_cast<QP::QSignal>(
681 static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.evt.idx);
682 l_rx.var.evt.idx += 8U;
683 if (l_rx.var.evt.idx
684 == (8U *static_cast<unsigned>(Q_SIGNAL_SIZE)))
685 {
686 l_rx.var.evt.len = 0U;
687 l_rx.var.evt.idx = 0U;
688 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_LEN);
689 }
690 break;
691 }
692 case WAIT4_EVT_LEN: {
693 l_rx.var.evt.len |= static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
694 static_cast<unsigned>(b) << l_rx.var.evt.idx);
695 l_rx.var.evt.idx += 8U;
696 if (l_rx.var.evt.idx == (8U * 2U)) {
697 if ((l_rx.var.evt.len + sizeof(QP::QEvt))
698 <= static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
699 QP::QF::poolGetMaxBlockSize()))
700 {
701 // report Ack before generating any other QS records
702 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_EVENT);
703
704 l_rx.var.evt.e = QP::QF::newX_(
705 (static_cast<std::uint_fast16_t>(l_rx.var.evt.len)
706 + sizeof(QP::QEvt)),
707 0U, // margin
708 static_cast<enum_t>(l_rx.var.evt.sig));
709 // event allocated?
710 if (l_rx.var.evt.e != nullptr) {
711 l_rx.var.evt.p =
712 reinterpret_cast<std::uint8_t *>(l_rx.var.evt.e);
713 l_rx.var.evt.p = &l_rx.var.evt.p[sizeof(QP::QEvt)];
714 if (l_rx.var.evt.len > 0U) {
715 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_PAR);
716 }
717 else {
718 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_FRAME);
719 }
720 }
721 else {
722 rxReportError_(
723 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_EVENT));
724 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
725 }
726 }
727 else {
728 rxReportError_(
729 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_EVENT));
730 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
731 }
732 }
733 break;
734 }
735 case WAIT4_EVT_PAR: { // event parameters
736 *l_rx.var.evt.p = b;
737 ++l_rx.var.evt.p;
738 --l_rx.var.evt.len;
739 if (l_rx.var.evt.len == 0U) {
740 tran_(WAIT4_EVT_FRAME);
741 }
742 break;
743 }
744 case WAIT4_EVT_FRAME: {
745 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
746 break;
747 }
748
749#ifdef Q_UTEST
750 case WAIT4_TEST_SETUP_FRAME: {
751 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
752 break;
753 }
754 case WAIT4_TEST_TEARDOWN_FRAME: {
755 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
756 break;
757 }
758 case WAIT4_TEST_CONTINUE_FRAME: {
759 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
760 break;
761 }
762 case WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_DATA: {
763 l_rx.var.tp.data |=
764 (static_cast<QP::QSFun>(b) << l_rx.var.tp.idx);
765 l_rx.var.tp.idx += 8U;
766 if (l_rx.var.tp.idx == (8U * sizeof(std::uint32_t))) {
767 l_rx.var.tp.addr = 0U;
768 l_rx.var.tp.idx = 0U;
769 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_ADDR);
770 }
771 break;
772 }
773 case WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_ADDR: {
774 l_rx.var.tp.addr |=
775 (static_cast<std::uint32_t>(b) << l_rx.var.tp.idx);
776 l_rx.var.tp.idx += 8U;
777 if (l_rx.var.tp.idx
778 == (8U * static_cast<unsigned>(QS_FUN_PTR_SIZE)))
779 {
780 tran_(WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_FRAME);
781 }
782 break;
783 }
784 case WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_FRAME: {
785 // keep ignoring the data until a frame is collected
786 break;
787 }
788#endif // Q_UTEST
789
790 case ERROR_STATE: {
791 // keep ignoring the data until a good frame is collected
792 break;
793 }
794 default: { // unexpected or unimplemented state
795 rxReportError_(0x45U);
796 tran_(ERROR_STATE);
797 break;
798 }
799 }
800}
801
802//............................................................................
803void rxHandleGoodFrame_(std::uint8_t const state) {
804 std::uint8_t i;
805 std::uint8_t *ptr;
806
807 switch (state) {
808 case WAIT4_INFO_FRAME: {
809 // no need to report Ack or Done
810 QP::QS::target_info_pre_(0U); // send only Target info
811 break;
812 }
813 case WAIT4_RESET_FRAME: {
814 // no need to report Ack or Done, because Target resets
815 QP::QS::onReset(); // reset the Target
816 break;
817 }
818 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM1: // intentionally fall-through
819 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM2: // intentionally fall-through
820 case WAIT4_CMD_PARAM3: // intentionally fall-through
821 case WAIT4_CMD_FRAME: {
822 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_COMMAND);
823 QP::QS::onCommand(l_rx.var.cmd.cmdId, l_rx.var.cmd.param1,
824 l_rx.var.cmd.param2, l_rx.var.cmd.param3);
825#ifdef Q_UTEST
826 #if Q_UTEST != 0
827 QP::QS::processTestEvts_(); // process all events produced
828 #endif // Q_UTEST != 0
829#endif // Q_UTEST
830 rxReportDone_(QP::QS_RX_COMMAND);
831 break;
832 }
833 case WAIT4_TICK_FRAME: {
834 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_TICK);
835#ifdef Q_UTEST
836 QP::QTimeEvt::tick1_(
837 static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(l_rx.var.tick.rate),
838 &QP::QS::rxPriv_);
839 #if Q_UTEST != 0
840 QP::QS::processTestEvts_(); // process all events produced
841 #endif // Q_UTEST != 0
842#else
843 QP::QTimeEvt::tick(
844 static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(l_rx.var.tick.rate),
845 &QP::QS::rxPriv_);
846#endif // Q_UTEST
847 rxReportDone_(QP::QS_RX_TICK);
848 break;
849 }
850 case WAIT4_PEEK_FRAME: {
851 // no need to report Ack or Done
852 QP::QS::beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(
853 QP::QS_PEEK_DATA));
854 ptr = static_cast<std::uint8_t*>(
855 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AP_OBJ]);
856 ptr = &ptr[l_rx.var.peek.offs];
857 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // timestamp
858 QS_U16_PRE_(l_rx.var.peek.offs); // data offset
859 QS_U8_PRE_(l_rx.var.peek.size); // data size
860 QS_U8_PRE_(l_rx.var.peek.num); // number of data items
861 for (i = 0U; i < l_rx.var.peek.num; ++i) {
862 switch (l_rx.var.peek.size) {
863 case 1:
864 QS_U8_PRE_(ptr[i]);
865 break;
866 case 2:
867 QS_U16_PRE_(
868 reinterpret_cast<std::uint16_t*>(ptr)[i]);
869 break;
870 case 4:
871 QS_U32_PRE_(
872 reinterpret_cast<std::uint32_t*>(ptr)[i]);
873 break;
874 default:
875 // intentionally empty
876 break;
877 }
878 }
879 QP::QS::endRec_();
880
881 QS_REC_DONE(); // user callback (if defined)
882 break;
883 }
884 case WAIT4_POKE_DATA: {
885 // received less than expected poke data items
886 rxReportError_(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_POKE));
887 break;
888 }
889 case WAIT4_POKE_FRAME: {
890 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_POKE);
891 // no need to report done
892 break;
893 }
894 case WAIT4_FILL_FRAME: {
895 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_FILL);
896 ptr = static_cast<std::uint8_t *>(
897 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AP_OBJ]);
898 ptr = &ptr[l_rx.var.poke.offs];
899 for (i = 0U; i < l_rx.var.poke.num; ++i) {
900 switch (l_rx.var.poke.size) {
901 case 1:
902 ptr[i] =
903 static_cast<std::uint8_t>(l_rx.var.poke.data);
904 break;
905 case 2:
906 reinterpret_cast<std::uint16_t *>(ptr)[i] =
907 static_cast<std::uint16_t>(l_rx.var.poke.data);
908 break;
909 case 4:
910 reinterpret_cast<std::uint32_t *>(ptr)[i] =
911 l_rx.var.poke.data;
912 break;
913 default:
914 // intentionally empty
915 break;
916 }
917 }
918 break;
919 }
920 case WAIT4_FILTER_FRAME: {
921 rxReportAck_(static_cast<enum QP::QSpyRxRecords>(
922 l_rx.var.flt.recId));
923
924 // apply the received filters
925 if (l_rx.var.flt.recId
926 == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_GLB_FILTER))
927 {
928 for (i = 0U;
929 i < static_cast<std::uint8_t>(sizeof(QP::QS::filt_.glb));
930 ++i)
931 {
932 QP::QS::filt_.glb[i] = l_rx.var.flt.data[i];
933 }
934 // leave the "not maskable" filters enabled,
935 // see qs.hpp, Miscellaneous QS records (not maskable)
936 QP::QS::filt_.glb[0] |= 0x01U;
937 QP::QS::filt_.glb[7] |= 0xFCU;
938 QP::QS::filt_.glb[8] |= 0x7FU;
939
940 // never enable the last 3 records (0x7D, 0x7E, 0x7F)
941 QP::QS::filt_.glb[15] &= 0x1FU;
942 }
943 else if (l_rx.var.flt.recId
944 == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_LOC_FILTER))
945 {
946 for (i = 0U; i < Q_DIM(QP::QS::filt_.loc); ++i) {
947 QP::QS::filt_.loc[i] = l_rx.var.flt.data[i];
948 }
949 // leave QS_ID == 0 always on
950 QP::QS::filt_.loc[0] |= 0x01U;
951 }
952 else {
953 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.flt.recId);
954 }
955 // no need to report Done
956 break;
957 }
958 case WAIT4_OBJ_FRAME: {
959 i = l_rx.var.obj.kind;
960 if (i < static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS::MAX_OBJ)) {
961 if (l_rx.var.obj.recId
962 == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_CURR_OBJ))
963 {
964 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[i] =
965 reinterpret_cast<void *>(l_rx.var.obj.addr);
966 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_CURR_OBJ);
967 }
968 else if (l_rx.var.obj.recId
969 == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_AO_FILTER))
970 {
971 if (l_rx.var.obj.addr != 0U) {
972 std::int_fast16_t const filter =
973 static_cast<std::int_fast16_t>(
974 reinterpret_cast<QP::QActive *>(
975 l_rx.var.obj.addr)->getPrio());
976 QP::QS::locFilter_((i == 0)
977 ? filter
978 :-filter);
979 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_AO_FILTER);
980 }
981 else {
982 rxReportError_(static_cast<enum_t>(
983 QP::QS_RX_AO_FILTER));
984 }
985 }
986 else {
987 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.obj.recId);
988 }
989 }
990 // both SM and AO
991 else if (i == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS::SM_AO_OBJ)) {
992 if (l_rx.var.obj.recId
993 == static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_CURR_OBJ))
994 {
995 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::SM_OBJ]
996 = reinterpret_cast<void *>(l_rx.var.obj.addr);
997 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AO_OBJ]
998 = reinterpret_cast<void *>(l_rx.var.obj.addr);
999 }
1000 rxReportAck_(
1001 static_cast<enum QP::QSpyRxRecords>(l_rx.var.obj.recId));
1002 }
1003 else {
1004 rxReportError_(l_rx.var.obj.recId);
1005 }
1006 break;
1007 }
1008 case WAIT4_QUERY_FRAME: {
1009 queryCurrObj_(l_rx.var.obj.kind);
1010 break;
1011 }
1012 case WAIT4_EVT_FRAME: {
1013 // NOTE: Ack was already reported in the WAIT4_EVT_LEN state
1014#ifdef Q_UTEST
1015 QP::QS::onTestEvt(l_rx.var.evt.e); // "massage" the event
1016#endif // Q_UTEST
1017 // use 'i' as status, 0 == success,no-recycle
1018 i = 0U;
1019
1020 if (l_rx.var.evt.prio == 0U) { // publish
1021 QP::QActive::publish_(l_rx.var.evt.e, &QP::QS::rxPriv_, 0U);
1022 }
1023 else if (l_rx.var.evt.prio < QF_MAX_ACTIVE) {
1024 if (!QP::QActive::registry_[l_rx.var.evt.prio]->POST_X(
1025 l_rx.var.evt.e,
1026 0U, // margin
1027 &QP::QS::rxPriv_))
1028 {
1029 // failed QACTIVE_POST() recycles the event
1030 i = 0x80U; // failure, no recycle
1031 }
1032 }
1033 else if (l_rx.var.evt.prio == 255U) {
1034 // dispatch to the current SM object
1035 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::SM_OBJ] != nullptr) {
1036 // increment the ref-ctr to simulate the situation
1037 // when the event is just retreived from a queue.
1038 // This is expected for the following QF::gc() call.
1039 QP::QEvt_refCtr_inc_(l_rx.var.evt.e);
1040
1041 static_cast<QP::QAsm *>(
1042 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::SM_OBJ])
1043 ->dispatch(l_rx.var.evt.e, 0U);
1044 i = 0x01U; // success, recycle
1045 }
1046 else {
1047 i = 0x81U; // failure, recycle
1048 }
1049 }
1050 else if (l_rx.var.evt.prio == 254U) {
1051 // init the current SM object"
1052 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::SM_OBJ] != nullptr) {
1053 // increment the ref-ctr to simulate the situation
1054 // when the event is just retreived from a queue.
1055 // This is expected for the following QF::gc() call.
1056 QP::QEvt_refCtr_inc_(l_rx.var.evt.e);
1057
1058 static_cast<QP::QAsm *>(
1059 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::SM_OBJ])
1060 ->init(l_rx.var.evt.e, 0U);
1061 i = 0x01U; // success, recycle
1062 }
1063 else {
1064 i = 0x81U; // failure, recycle
1065 }
1066 }
1067 else if (l_rx.var.evt.prio == 253U) {
1068 // post to the current AO
1069 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AO_OBJ] != nullptr) {
1070 if (!static_cast<QP::QActive *>(
1071 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AO_OBJ])->POST_X(
1072 l_rx.var.evt.e,
1073 0U, // margin
1074 &QP::QS::rxPriv_))
1075 {
1076 // failed QACTIVE_POST() recycles the event
1077 i = 0x80U; // failure, no recycle
1078 }
1079 }
1080 else {
1081 i = 0x81U; // failure, recycle
1082 }
1083 }
1084 else {
1085 i = 0x81U; // failure, recycle
1086 }
1087
1088#if (QF_MAX_EPOOL > 0U)
1089 // recycle needed?
1090 if ((i & 1U) != 0U) {
1091 QP::QF::gc(l_rx.var.evt.e);
1092 }
1093#endif
1094 // failure?
1095 if ((i & 0x80U) != 0U) {
1096 rxReportError_(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_EVENT));
1097 }
1098 else {
1099#ifdef Q_UTEST
1100 #if Q_UTEST != 0
1101 QP::QS::processTestEvts_(); // process all events produced
1102 #endif // Q_UTEST != 0
1103#endif // Q_UTEST
1104 rxReportDone_(QP::QS_RX_EVENT);
1105 }
1106 break;
1107 }
1108
1109#ifdef Q_UTEST
1110 case WAIT4_TEST_SETUP_FRAME: {
1111 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_TEST_SETUP);
1112 QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpNum = 0U; // clear Test-Probes
1113 QP::QS::tstPriv_.testTime = 0U; //clear time tick
1114 // don't clear current objects
1115 QP::QS::onTestSetup(); // application-specific test setup
1116 // no need to report Done
1117 break;
1118 }
1119 case WAIT4_TEST_TEARDOWN_FRAME: {
1120 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_TEST_TEARDOWN);
1121 QP::QS::onTestTeardown(); // application-specific test teardown
1122 // no need to report Done
1123 break;
1124 }
1125 case WAIT4_TEST_CONTINUE_FRAME: {
1126 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_TEST_CONTINUE);
1127 QP::QS::rxPriv_.inTestLoop = false; // exit the QUTest loop
1128 // no need to report Done
1129 break;
1130 }
1131 case WAIT4_TEST_PROBE_FRAME: {
1132 rxReportAck_(QP::QS_RX_TEST_PROBE);
1133 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(815,
1134 QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpNum
1135 < (sizeof(QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpBuf)
1136 / sizeof(QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpBuf[0])));
1137 QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpBuf[QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpNum] = l_rx.var.tp;
1138 ++QP::QS::tstPriv_.tpNum;
1139 // no need to report Done
1140 break;
1141 }
1142#endif // Q_UTEST
1143
1144 case ERROR_STATE: {
1145 // keep ignoring all bytes until new frame
1146 break;
1147 }
1148 default: {
1149 rxReportError_(0x47U);
1150 break;
1151 }
1152 }
1153}
1154
1155//............................................................................
1156static void rxHandleBadFrame_(std::uint8_t const state) noexcept {
1157 rxReportError_(0x50U); // error for all bad frames
1158 switch (state) {
1159 case WAIT4_EVT_FRAME: {
1160 Q_ASSERT_INCRIT(910, l_rx.var.evt.e != nullptr);
1161#if (QF_MAX_EPOOL > 0U)
1162 QP::QF::gc(l_rx.var.evt.e); // don't leak an allocated event
1163#endif
1164 break;
1165 }
1166 default: {
1167 // intentionally empty
1168 break;
1169 }
1170 }
1171}
1172
1173//............................................................................
1174static void rxReportAck_(enum QP::QSpyRxRecords const recId) noexcept {
1175 QP::QS::beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(QP::QS_RX_STATUS));
1176 QS_U8_PRE_(recId); // record ID
1177 QP::QS::endRec_();
1178 QS_REC_DONE(); // user callback (if defined)
1179}
1180
1181//............................................................................
1182static void rxReportError_(std::uint8_t const code) noexcept {
1183 QP::QS::beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(QP::QS_RX_STATUS));
1184 QS_U8_PRE_(0x80U | code); // error code
1185 QP::QS::endRec_();
1186 QS_REC_DONE(); // user callback (if defined)
1187}
1188
1189//............................................................................
1190static void rxReportDone_(enum QP::QSpyRxRecords const recId) noexcept {
1191 QP::QS::beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(QP::QS_TARGET_DONE));
1192 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // timestamp
1193 QS_U8_PRE_(recId); // record ID
1194 QP::QS::endRec_();
1195 QS_REC_DONE(); // user callback (if defined)
1196}
1197
1198//............................................................................
1199static void queryCurrObj_(std::uint8_t obj_kind) noexcept {
1200 Q_REQUIRE_INCRIT(200, obj_kind < Q_DIM(QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj));
1201
1202 if (QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind] != nullptr) {
1203 QP::QS::beginRec_(static_cast<std::uint_fast8_t>(QP::QS_QUERY_DATA));
1204 QS_TIME_PRE_(); // timestamp
1205 QS_U8_PRE_(obj_kind); // object kind
1206 QS_OBJ_PRE_(QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind]); // object pointer
1207 switch (obj_kind) {
1208 case QP::QS::SM_OBJ: // intentionally fall through
1209 case QP::QS::AO_OBJ:
1210 QS_FUN_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QHsm *>(
1211 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getStateHandler());
1212 break;
1213 case QP::QS::MP_OBJ:
1214 QS_MPC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QMPool *>(
1215 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getNFree());
1216 QS_MPC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QMPool *>(
1217 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getNMin());
1218 break;
1219 case QP::QS::EQ_OBJ:
1220 QS_EQC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QEQueue *>(
1221 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getNFree());
1222 QS_EQC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QEQueue *>(
1223 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getNMin());
1224 break;
1225 case QP::QS::TE_OBJ:
1226 QS_OBJ_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QTimeEvt *>(
1227 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getAct());
1228 QS_TEC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QTimeEvt *>(
1229 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getCtr());
1230 QS_TEC_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QTimeEvt *>(
1231 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->getInterval());
1232 QS_SIG_PRE_(reinterpret_cast<QP::QTimeEvt *>(
1233 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->sig);
1234 QS_U8_PRE_ (reinterpret_cast<QP::QTimeEvt *>(
1235 QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[obj_kind])->refCtr_);
1236 break;
1237 default:
1238 // intentionally empty
1239 break;
1240 }
1241 QP::QS::endRec_();
1242 QS_REC_DONE(); // user callback (if defined)
1243 }
1244 else {
1245 rxReportError_(static_cast<std::uint8_t>(QP::QS_RX_AO_FILTER));
1246 }
1247}
1248
1249//............................................................................
1250static void rxPoke_() noexcept {
1251 std::uint8_t * ptr =
1252 static_cast<std::uint8_t *>(QP::QS::rxPriv_.currObj[QP::QS::AP_OBJ]);
1253 ptr = &ptr[l_rx.var.poke.offs];
1254 switch (l_rx.var.poke.size) {
1255 case 1:
1256 *ptr = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(l_rx.var.poke.data);
1257 break;
1258 case 2:
1259 *reinterpret_cast<std::uint16_t *>(ptr)
1260 = static_cast<std::uint16_t>(l_rx.var.poke.data);
1261 break;
1262 case 4:
1263 *reinterpret_cast<std::uint32_t *>(ptr) = l_rx.var.poke.data;
1264 break;
1265 default:
1266 Q_ERROR_ID(900);
1267 break;
1268 }
1269
1270 l_rx.var.poke.data = 0U;
1271 l_rx.var.poke.idx = 0U;
1272 l_rx.var.poke.offs += static_cast<std::uint16_t>(l_rx.var.poke.size);
1273}
1274
1275} // unnamed namespace

QP::QActive
Active object class (based on the QHsm implementation strategy)

static QActive * registry_[QF_MAX_ACTIVE+1U]

static void publish_(QEvt const *const e, void const *const sender, std::uint_fast8_t const qs_id) noexcept
Definition qf_ps.cpp:107
QP::QAsm
Abstract State Machine class (state machine interface)

QP::QEQueue
Native QP event queue.
Definition qequeue.hpp:70
QP::QEvt
Event class.
Definition qp.hpp:144
QP::QHsm
Hierarchical State Machine class (QHsm-style state machine implementation strategy)
Definition qp.hpp:394
QP::QMPool
Native QF Memory Pool.
Definition qmpool.hpp:101
